name: communications 21
tagline: Atlanta Integrated Marketing Public Relations Firm
description:
communications 21, inc., (c21) is an integrated marketing public relations firm dedicated to helping clients communicate effectively in the 21st century.  c21® specializes in content marketing for business and consumer brands and organizations to increase awareness and drive demand. 
Our award-winning work includes marketing and promotional campaigns, strategic media relations, executive media training, crisis management, special events and a myriad of interactive services.
